projects.name: Ticketing Using Mircroservices Hosted on DigitalOcean Kubernetes Clusters
projects.summary:
TicketingApp
Sale and purchase tickets

•	Includes ticket, order, expiration, payment, and client independent services
•	Typescripts, Node.JS, Express, React, Next.JS, Jest applied
•	Deployed on Digital Ocean Kubernetes Clusters.

projects.name: Library Database Project using SQL Server (Team Project)
projects.summary:
•	It has three schemas – and 9 tables 
•	Each table are linked with their appropriate primary keys 
•	and tables can correlate one to another
•	Created queries, views, function, trigger and procedures
•	finished all actions for borrowing a book that includes validating membership, checking the loanable status of this book, inserting a record into loan table, then updating copy table and item table.

projects.summary:
